metadata.Title: CVE-2019-2224 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2019-15140. Reason: This candidate is a duplicate of CVE-2019-15140. Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2019-15140 instead of this candidate. All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> This is an Android-specific CVE, the equivalent CVE in ImageMagick is CVE-2019-15140

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
